MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML1 postcode area of Motherwell, affecting properties in Stanefield Drive and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have now arrived on site and in order to complete the repair due to an underground fault outside Stanefield drive, we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11.45am. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:28am on Sunday, 22 November 2020
